name: Quivern

aura.name: sky_dragon's_affection
aura.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Enhances Dragon attacks while mounted.

description: Sleeping while cuddling a Quivern is said to be a heavenly experience, but there are some who have been crushed and sent to heaven by ones that toss and turn in their sleep.

skills.name: dragon_cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: spirit_fire
skills.description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

skills.name: acid_rain
skills.description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

skills.name: draconic_breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: grass_tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: aqua_burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: dragon_meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
